column.name: UserNum
column.summary: FK to Userod.UserNum. Will only be shown to that specific user. 0 is all users.

column.name: IsSuperFamily
column.summary: Boolean. Is true when the message is specifically created for super families.

column.name: MobileAppDeviceNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: FK to clinic.ClinicNum.

column.name: DeviceName
column.summary: The name of the device.

column.name: UniqueID
column.summary: The unique identifier of the device. Platform specific.

column.name: IsAllowed
column.summary: Indicates whether the device is allowed to operate the checkin app.

column.name: LastAttempt
column.summary: The date and time of the last attempted login.

column.name: LastLogin
column.summary: The date and time of the last succesful login.

column.name: PayConnectResponseWebNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: PatNum
column.summary: FK to patient.PatNum.

column.name: PayNum
column.summary: FK to payment.PayNum.

column.name: AccountToken
column.summary: The account token used to poll the processing status.

column.name: PaymentToken
column.summary: The payment token used to poll the processing status.

column.name: ProcessingStatus
column.summary: Enum:PayConnectWebStatus Used to determine if the payment is pending, needs action, or is completed and attached to a payment.

column.name: DateTimeEntry
column.summary: Timestamp automatically generated and user not allowed to change. The actual datetime of entry.

column.name: DateTimePending
column.summary: DateTime that the payment went to the pending status.

column.name: DateTimeCompleted
column.summary: DateTime that the payment went to the completed status and is attached to a payment.

column.name: DateTimeExpired
column.summary: DateTime that the payment opportunity time expired.

column.name: DateTimeLastError
column.summary: DateTime of the last time that the payment had an error.

column.name: LastResponseStr
column.summary: Raw JSON response (or error) from PayConnect.

column.name: CCSource
column.summary: Enum:CreditCardSource .

Enumeration.name: CreditCardSource
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0 - Storing the actual credit card number. Not recommended.
2 - Credit card created via X-Web (an eService)
4 - Credit card has been added through the local installation of X-Charge and the PayConnect web service.
5 - Made from the login screen of the Patient Portal.
7 - PaySimple ACH web service (from within OD).
8 - PayConnect credit card (made from Patient Portal)
9 - PayConnect credit card (made from Patient Portal Login screen).

column.name: Amount
column.summary: The amount of the payment that is attempting to be made.

column.name: PayNote
column.summary: The note entered when making a payment.

column.name: AdjNum
column.summary: FK to adjustment.AdjNum. Can be 0. Indicates that this paysplit is meant to counteract an Adjustment.

column.name: StateLicense
column.summary: License number corresponding to the StateWhereLicensed. Can include punctuation

column.name: StateRxID
column.summary: Provider medical State ID.

column.name: StateWhereLicensed
column.summary: The state abbreviation where the state license number in the StateLicense field is legally registered.

column.name: ProviderClinicLinkNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: ProvNum
column.summary: FK to provider.ProvNum

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: FK to clinic.ClinicNum. An entry of -1 means the provider is associated to no clinics.

column.name: ReactivationNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: PatNum
column.summary: FK to patient.PatNum.

column.name: ReactivationStatus
column.summary: FK to definition.DefNum. Uses the existing RecallUnschedStatus DefCat.

column.name: ReactivationNote
column.summary: An administrative note for staff use.

column.name: DoNotContact
column.summary: The patient can set this property if they don't want to be contacted so that it won't interfere with the max attempts to contact option.

column.name: HasEarlyAccess
column.summary: This is a customer that is allowed early access to certain features. E.g. downloading the Alpha version of the software.

column.name: UnearnedTypes
column.summary: If UsePrepay is true, when the procedure is created from this repeat charge, it will allocate payments from these unearned types. Stored as a comma separated list of DefNums of Category PaySplitUnearnedType. If empty, then all unearned types will be considered.

column.name: LayoutMode
column.summary: Used when there are multiple modes for associated sheetDef, like chart module modes (base,treatment plan,ecw,orion,...). SheetFieldLayoutMode.Default for all sheetdefs that do not have multiple modes.

column.name: GlobalTaskFilterType
column.summary: Enum:GlobalTaskFilterType 0=Disabled, 1=Default, 2=None, 3=Clinic, 4=Region. If a type is selected, then tasks in this tasklist will be filtered by default such that only tasks that match the tasklist's GlobalFilterType will show in the view.

Enumeration.name: GlobalTaskFilterType
Enumeration.summary: Used to determine which tasks should be filtered to show in a tasklist.

column.name: SignaturePractice
column.summary: The encrypted and bound signature in base64 format. The signature is bound to the concatenation of the tp Note, DateTP, and to each proctp Descript and PatAmt.

column.name: DateTSigned
column.summary: The date of the treatment plan is signed.

column.name: DateTPracticeSigned
column.summary: The date of the treatment plan is signed by the office.

column.name: SignatureText
column.summary: The typed name of the person who signed the treatplan.

column.name: SignaturePracticeText
column.summary: The typed name of the person who signed the practice signature.
